Package com.github.tommyettinger.anim8

Class FastAPNG

java.lang.Object
com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.AnimatedPNG
com.github.tommyettinger.anim8.FastAPNG
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, AnimationWriter
@Deprecated public class FastAPNG extends AnimatedPNG
Deprecated.
Use AnimatedPNG instead.
Full-color animated PNG encoder with compression. This is purely here for compatibility; FastAPNG is identical to AnimatedPNG. 
 Copyright (c) 2007 Matthias Mann - www.matthiasmann.de

  • Constructor Details

    • FastAPNG

      public FastAPNG()
      Deprecated.
      Creates an AnimatedPNG writer with an initial buffer size of 1024. The buffer can resize later if needed.

    • FastAPNG

      public FastAPNG(int initialBufferSize)
      Deprecated.
      Creates an AnimatedPNG writer with the given initial buffer size. The buffer can resize if needed, so using a small size is only a problem if it slows down writing by forcing a resize for several parts of a PNG. A default of 1024 is reasonable.
      Parameters:
      initialBufferSize - the initial size for the buffer that stores PNG chunks; 1024 is a reasonable default
